item.title: Classes
item.description: The Co-Coaches Chetan Thotti Hi! My name is Chetan Thotti. I am a senior at Scripps Ranch High who enjoys STEM clubs and programs. I coach Python, having built Python projects as a side hobby for years. I’m especially interested in teaching and aerospace engineering. I love launching rockets in our school’s Aerospace Club with my teammates and collaborators. I have tutored younger students in the Thinkist program and my Peer Tutoring Club.

item.title: About Us
item.description: Welcome to Codify, the programming summer camp for aspiring programmers of all ages! At Codify, we believe that coding is not just a skill, but a way of thinking. Our mission is to inspire and empower the next generation of programmers to harness the power of technology and use it to make a positive impact on the world. Our experienced instructors are passionate about teaching coding and technology skills in a fun and engaging way.

item.title: Team
item.description: Veer Chopra and Aarav Maheshwari Veer Chopra (Co-Founder): Hello! My name is Veer Chopra, and I am a co-founder of Codify and a senior at Scripps Ranch High School. Over the years, Iâ€™ve learned C++, Python, and HTML/CSS. Algorithms, math, and cybersecurity are big parts of my life: I’ve made USACO Silver and AIME, and placed first in the Air Force division at the CyberPatriot National Championship. I also perform on my AFJROTC unit’s Color Guard Fancy Drill Team.
